name: Reapers, INC.
description:
Reapers, Inc.


Game Overview

Reapers, INC. is a third person 3D Sandbox style platformer, , where the player takes the role of an intern grim reaper who is assigned the task of carrying out some kills in order to fill out the year end quota in the Death HQ. But the player cannot just go around slashing people around the town, he has to cause accidents to eliminate the people of the town and reap their souls in order to get a permanent status in the Reapers, INC. 

Reapers, INC. was created by a team of 6 over a period of 15 weeks by team Covalent Bond, a team from GD02 of the Langara Centre for Entertainment Arts 
Keyboard Controls
Movement – WASD

Look Around – Mouse

Interact – Left Mouse

Jump – Space

Set Teleport point – Hold T

Teleport - T
